org.jsimpledb.parse.expr

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.parse.expr.Value
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicValue

    public class Value
extends Object
    An evaluation-time value used in an expression.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Value.GetFunction
      Function that invokes Value.get() on its argument.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Value NO_VALUE
      Special value that can be used to indicate "no value" in certain situations, such as return value from a method returning void.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for a constant, non L-Value instance.

      Primary constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_VALUE

        public static final Value NO_VALUE
        Special value that can be used to indicate "no value" in certain situations, such as return value from a method returning void. Actually evaluates to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Value

        public Value(Object obj)
        Constructor for a constant, non L-Value instance.

      • Value

        public Value(Object obj,
     Setter setter)
        Primary constructor.
        Parameters:
        obj - value to be returned by get() (unless overridden by subclass)
        setter - callback for changing this instance's value, or null if this instance is not an L-Value

        public Value xxcrement(ParseSession session,
              String operation,
              boolean increment)

        operation - description of operation for error messages
